title: Hour 2: Stefon Diggs joins the show!
description:
Who proved themselves more this week, Tua or Jalen Hurts? Find out why Mina Kimes is siding with Hurts. Plus Stephen A. gives his A-List of the top 5 teams in the NFL. Also Mina Kimes, says Aaron Donald is the best player in the NFL, no question asked. Next Stefon Diggs joins the show following the Bills 41-7 win over the Titans. Later the crew debates if Tyreek Hill and Jaylen Waddle are the best WR duo in the NFL.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
